00049 class demod_msk_processor : public processor::base_iq {
00050 public:
00051   typedef boost::shared_ptr<demod_msk_processor> sptr;
00052   typedef std::complex<double> complex_type;
00053   
00054   class result_phase : public processor::result_base {
00055   public:
00056     typedef boost::shared_ptr<result_phase> sptr;
00057     
00058     virtual ~result_phase() {}
00059     static sptr make(std::string name,
00060                      ptime  t,
00061                      double fc_Hz,
00062                      double fm_Hz,
00063                      double amplitude,
00064                      double sn_db,
00065                      double phase_rad) {
00066       return sptr(new result_phase(name, t, fc_Hz, fm_Hz, amplitude, sn_db, phase_rad));
00067     }
00068 
00069     double fc_Hz()     const { return fc_Hz_; }
00070     double fm_Hz()     const { return fm_Hz_; }
00071     double amplitude() const { return amplitude_; }
00072     double sn_db()     const { return sn_db_; }
00073     double phase_rad() const { return phase_rad_; }
00074 
00075     virtual std::ostream& dump_header(std::ostream& os) const {      
00076       return os
00077         << "# fc[Hz] = " << boost::format("%15.8f") % fc_Hz() << "\n"
00078         << "# fm[Hz] = " << boost::format("%7.3f")  % fm_Hz() << "\n"
00079         << "# Time_UTC Amplitude[dB] S/N[db] Phase[rad] ";
00080     }
00081     virtual std::ostream& dump_data(std::ostream& os) const {
00082       return os
00083         << boost::format("%7.2f") % amplitude() << " "
00084         << boost::format("%7.2f") % sn_db()     << " "
00085         << boost::format("%6.3f") % phase_rad();
00086     }
00087     
00088   protected:
00089   private:
00090     result_phase(std::string name,
00091                  ptime  t,
00092                  double fc_Hz,
00093                  double fm_Hz,
00094                  double amplitude,
00095                  double sn_db,
00096                  double phase_rad)
00097       : result_base(name, t)
00098       , fc_Hz_(fc_Hz)
00099       , fm_Hz_(fm_Hz)
00100       , amplitude_(amplitude)
00101       , sn_db_(sn_db)
00102       , phase_rad_(phase_rad) {}
00103     
00104     const double fc_Hz_;
00105     const double fm_Hz_;
00106     const double amplitude_;
00107     const double sn_db_;
00108     const double phase_rad_;
00109   } ;

00111   class result_bits : public processor::result_base {
00112   public:
00113     typedef boost::shared_ptr<result_bits> sptr;
00114     typedef std::vector<bool> bit_vector_type;
00115     typedef bit_vector_type::iterator iterator;
00116     typedef bit_vector_type::const_iterator const_iterator;
00117 
00118     virtual ~result_bits() {}
00119     static sptr make(std::string name,
00120                      ptime  t,
00121                      double fc_Hz,
00122                      double fm_Hz) {
00123       return sptr(new result_bits(name, t, fc_Hz, fm_Hz));
00124     }
00125 
00126     double fc_Hz()   const { return fc_Hz_; }
00127     double fm_Hz()   const { return fm_Hz_; }
00128     double quality() const { return quality_; }
00129 
00130     void  set_quality(double q) { quality_ = q; }
00131 
00132     size_t size() const { return bitvec_.size(); }
00133     const_iterator begin() const { return bitvec_.begin(); }
00134     const_iterator end() const { return bitvec_.end(); }
00135 
00136     void clear() { bitvec_.clear(); }
00137     void push_back(bool bit) { bitvec_.push_back(bit); }
00138 
00139     virtual std::ostream& dump_header(std::ostream& os) const {      
00140       return os
00141         << "# fc[Hz] = " << boost::format("%15.8f") % fc_Hz() << "\n"
00142         << "# fm[Hz] = " << boost::format("%7.3f")  % fm_Hz() << "\n"
00143         << "# Time_UTC quality[%] bits ";
00144     }
00145     virtual std::ostream& dump_data(std::ostream& os) const {
00146       os << boost::format("%3.0f") % (100.*quality()) << " ";
00147       for (const_iterator i(begin()); i!=end();) {
00148         unsigned char x(0);
00149         for (size_t j(0); j<4 && i!=end(); ++j, ++i)
00150           x |= (*i << (3-j));
00151         const char c(x<10 ? '0'+x : 'A'+x-10);
00152         os << c;
00153       }
00154       return os;
00155     }
00156

00158   private:
00159     result_bits(std::string name,
00160                ptime  t,
00161                double fc_Hz,
00162                double fm_Hz)
00163       : result_base(name, t)
00164       , fc_Hz_(fc_Hz)
00165       , fm_Hz_(fm_Hz)
00166       , quality_(0) {}
00167     
00168     const double    fc_Hz_;
00169     const double    fm_Hz_;
00170     double          quality_;
00171     bit_vector_type bitvec_;
00172   } ;

00174   typedef boost::posix_time::time_duration time_duration;
00175   typedef FFT::FFTWTransform<double> fft_type;
00176 
00177   demod_msk_processor(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00178     : base_iq(config)
00179     , fftw_(1024, FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_ESTIMATE)
00180     , name_(config.get<std::string>("<xmlattr>.name"))
00181     , fc_Hz_(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.fc_Hz"))
00182     , fm_Hz_(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.fm_Hz"))
00183     , record_bits_(config.get<bool>("<xmlattr>.recordBits", false))
00184     , dwl_Hz_(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.dwl_Hz"))
00185     , period_Sec_(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.period_Sec"))
00186     , min_SN_db_(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.min_SN_db"))
00187     , max_offset_ppb_rms_(config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.max_offset_ppb_rms"))
00188     , filter_(401, 0.05*fm_Hz_/200.)
00189     , filter_amp_pm_    (  config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.ampl_lowpass_tc_Sec"), period_Sec_)
00190     , filter_amp_center_(5*config.get<double>("<xmlattr>.ampl_lowpass_tc_Sec"), period_Sec_)
00191     , phase_(0)
00192     , signal_present_(0) {
00193     filter_plus_.add (Filter::LowPass<frequency_vector<double> >::make(1.0, 300));
00194     filter_minus_.add(Filter::LowPass<frequency_vector<double> >::make(1.0, 300));
00195   }

00200   double fm_Hz() const { return fm_Hz_; }

00202   void process_iq(service::sptr sp,
00203                   const_iterator i0,
00204                   const_iterator i1) {
00205     const size_t length(std::distance(i0, i1));
00206     if (length != fftw_.size())
00207       fftw_.resize(length);
00208 
00209     if (sp->offset_ppb_rms() > max_offset_ppb_rms_) {
00210       LOG_INFO(str(boost::format("offset_ppb = %.2f > %.2f is too big") % sp->offset_ppb_rms() % max_offset_ppb_rms_));
00211       return;
00212     }
00213 
00214     const double offset_ppb(sp->offset_ppb());
00215     const double offset_Hz((fc_Hz() + filter_.get_shift()*sp->sample_rate_Hz()) * offset_ppb*1e-9);
00216 
00217     // set up a new filter
00218     bool is_first_call(demod_msk_ == 0);
00219 
00220     if (not demod_msk_) {
00221       const double f_shift0_Hz(fc_Hz() - sp->center_frequency_Hz());
00222       double f_shift_Hz(filter_.shift(f_shift0_Hz/sp->sample_rate_Hz())*sp->sample_rate_Hz());
00223       fc_Hz_ -= f_shift_Hz;
00224       demod_msk_ = demod::msk::make(sp->sample_rate_Hz(),
00225                                     -(fc_Hz() - sp->center_frequency_Hz()) + offset_Hz,
00226                                     0.5*fm_Hz(), // baud/2
00227                                     dwl_Hz_, period_Sec_);
00228       std::cout << "shift: " << fc_Hz() << " " << sp->center_frequency_Hz() << " "
00229                 << f_shift0_Hz << " " << f_shift_Hz
00230                 << std::endl;
00231 
00232       // 0.05 = 250/sp->sample_rate_Hz() for 200 baud
00233       filter_.design(401, 1.25*fm_Hz_/sp->sample_rate_Hz());
00234 
00235       filter_amp_pm_.reset(-1);
00236       filter_amp_center_.reset(-1);
00237       signal_present_ = 0;
00238     }
00239 
00240     demod_msk_->update_ppb(sp->offset_ppb(),
00241                            -(fc_Hz() - sp->center_frequency_Hz()) + offset_Hz,
00242                            0.5*fm_Hz());
00243 //     std::vector<complex_type> samples2(length, complex_type(0));
00244 //     std::vector<complex_type>::iterator j(samples2.begin());
00245     for (const_iterator i(i0); i!=i1; ++i) {
00246       const complex_type sample(filter_.process(*i));
00247 //       *j = sample*sample;
00248       demod_msk_->process(sample);
00249 
00250       // amplitude and phase data
00251       if (not is_first_call && demod_msk_->phase_available()) {
00252         const double amplitude_minus (10*std::log10(std::abs(demod_msk_->gf_minus().x())));
00253         const double amplitude_center(10*std::log10(std::abs(demod_msk_->gf_center().x())));
00254         const double amplitude_plus  (10*std::log10(std::abs(demod_msk_->gf_plus().x())));
00255 
00256         if (filter_amp_pm_.get() < 0) {
00257           filter_amp_pm_.reset(0.5*(amplitude_plus+amplitude_minus));
00258           filter_amp_center_.reset(amplitude_center);
00259         } else {
00260           filter_amp_pm_.process(0.5*(amplitude_plus+amplitude_minus));
00261           filter_amp_center_.process(amplitude_center);
00262         }
00263         const double amplitude(filter_amp_pm_.get());
00264         const double sn_db(amplitude - filter_amp_center_.get());
00265 
00266         if (sn_db > min_SN_db_) {
00267           ++signal_present_;
00268 
00269           const double delta_phase_rad(demod_msk_->delta_phase_rad()
00270                                        + 2*M_PI*demod_msk_->period_sec() * (fc_Hz() - sp->center_frequency_Hz() - offset_Hz));
00271           phase_ += delta_phase_rad;
00272           while (phase_ >= M_PI) phase_ -= 2*M_PI;
00273           while (phase_ < -M_PI) phase_ += 2*M_PI;
00274           // std::cout << "XXX A+-0: " << amplitude << " " << sn_db << " " << sn_db+amplitude
00275           //           << " P: " << 0.5*(demod_msk_->pll_plus().theta() + demod_msk_->pll_minus().theta())
00276           //           << " DeltaF: " << demod_msk_->delta_phase_rad() /2/M_PI/demod_msk_->period_sec()
00277           //           << " " << delta_phase_rad /2/M_PI/demod_msk_->period_sec()
00278           //           << " " << phase_
00279           //           << " " << fc_Hz() - sp->center_frequency_Hz()
00280           //           << std::endl;
00281           const time_duration
00282             dt(0,0,0, std::distance(i0, i)*time_duration::ticks_per_second()/sp->sample_rate_Hz());
00283           result_phase::sptr r(result_phase::make(name_, sp->approx_ptime()+dt, fc_Hz(), fm_Hz_, amplitude, sn_db, phase_));
00284           sp->put_result(r);
00285         }
00286       }
00287 
00288       // collect bit data
00289       if (not is_first_call && demod_msk_->bit_available()) {
00290         if (not result_bits_) {
00291           const time_duration
00292             dt(0,0,0, std::distance(i0, i)*time_duration::ticks_per_second()/sp->sample_rate_Hz());
00293           result_bits_ = result_bits::make(name_+"_bits", sp->approx_ptime()+dt, fc_Hz(), fm_Hz());
00294         }
00295         result_bits_->push_back(demod_msk_->current_bit());
00296         if (result_bits_->size() == size_t(0.5+fm_Hz())) {
00297           result_bits_->set_quality(double(signal_present_));
00298 //           std::cout << name_ << " " << "quality= " << result_bits_->quality() << " " << signal_present_ << std::endl;
00299           if (record_bits_ && result_bits_->quality() > 0.5)
00300             sp->put_result(result_bits_);
00301           result_bits_.reset();
00302           signal_present_ = 0;
00303         }
00304       }
00305     }
00306 #if 0
00307     fftw_.transformVector(samples2, FFT::WindowFunction::Blackman<double>(samples2.size()));
00308     const FFTSpectrum<fft_type> s(fftw_, sp->sample_rate_Hz(), -2*(fc_Hz() - sp->center_frequency_Hz()));
00309     double f_plus(0), f_minus(0), sn_plus(0), sn_minus(0);
00310 
00311     std::cout << "ps: " << name_ << " " << length << " " << s.index2freq(length/2-1) << " " << s.index2freq(length/2) 
00312               << " minus " << (fc_Hz() - sp->center_frequency_Hz()) << std::endl;
00313     {
00314       const frequency_vector<double> ps(-250., -45., s, std::abs<double>);
00315       if (filter_minus_.x().empty())
00316         filter_minus_.init(sp->approx_ptime(), ps);
00317       else
00318         filter_minus_.update(sp->approx_ptime(), ps);
00319       
00320       const frequency_vector<double>& psf(filter_minus_.x());
00321       frequency_vector<double>::const_iterator i_max;
00322       double max(-1);
00323       double sum(0);
00324       for (frequency_vector<double>::const_iterator i(psf.begin()), end(psf.end()); i!=end; ++i) {
00325         std::cout << "ps: " << name_ << boost::format("%8.3f %.2e") % i->first % i->second << std::endl;
00326         sum += i->second;
00327         if (i->second > max) {
00328           max = i->second;
00329           i_max = i;
00330         }
00331       }
00332       double sum_w(0), sum_wx(0);
00333       for (frequency_vector<double>::const_iterator i(i_max-2); i!=(i_max+3) && i!=psf.end(); ++i) {
00334         sum_w += i->second;
00335         sum_wx += i->first * i->second;
00336       }
00337       f_minus  = sum_wx/sum_w;
00338       sn_minus = i_max->second/sum*psf.size();
00339     }
00340     {
00341       const frequency_vector<double> ps(45., 250., s, std::abs<double>);
00342       if (filter_plus_.x().empty())
00343         filter_plus_.init(sp->approx_ptime(), ps);
00344       else
00345         filter_plus_.update(sp->approx_ptime(), ps);
00346 
00347       const frequency_vector<double>& psf(filter_plus_.x());
00348       frequency_vector<double>::const_iterator i_max;
00349       double max(-1);
00350       double sum(0);
00351       for (frequency_vector<double>::const_iterator i(psf.begin()); i!=psf.end(); ++i) {
00352         std::cout << "ps: " << name_ << boost::format("%8.3f %.2e") % i->first % i->second << std::endl;
00353         sum += i->second;
00354         if (i->second > max) {
00355           max = i->second;
00356           i_max = i;
00357         }
00358       }
00359       double sum_w(0), sum_wx(0);
00360       for (frequency_vector<double>::const_iterator i(i_max-2); i!=(i_max+3) && i!=psf.end(); ++i) {
00361         sum_w += i->second;
00362         sum_wx += i->first * i->second;
00363       }
00364       f_plus  = sum_wx/sum_w;
00365       sn_plus = i_max->second/sum*psf.size();
00366     }
00367 #endif
00368   }
